attributes.action: STOP MANORFIELDS CARE HOME CLOSING DOWN !!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My dear Grandad who sadly suffers from Alzheimers has been living in his care home for 5 years now. Our family have now got to find another care home for him as Manorfields is closing down in March. Finding a new care home sounds simple..three other homes have closed already, the ones that haven't are private and my family along with many others cannot affford a minimum of £500 a week. Stop their home being closed down. These people who have fought for their country etc deserve a lot more than this.

rejection.details: I'm afraid that this is a matter for local government, not for the Prime Minister's office. Please contact your local MP for help and advice: http://www.parliament.uk/mpslordsandoffices/mps_and_lords/alcm.cfm
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
